mapper.select:
select count(0) from inno72_order where inno72_activity_plan_id = #{activityPlanId} and goods_status = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(order_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()

select orderGoods.goods_id as goodsId,orderGoods.order_id as orderId,o.user_id as userId,machine.machine_code machineCode,o.ref_order_id as taobaoOrderNum, orderGoods.goods_code as taobaoGoodsId from inno72_order_goods orderGoods join inno72_order o on orderGoods.order_id = o.id join inno72_goods g on orderGoods.goods_id = g.id left join inno72_machine machine on o.machine_id = machine.id where o.merchant_id=#{merchantId} and o.goods_status=1 and o.goods_type = 1 and g.seller_id=#{merchantId}

select o.id as id,o.order_num as orderNum,o.order_time as orderTime, og.goods_name as goodsName,o.order_price as orderPrice, o.order_status as orderStatus,fund.create_time as refundCreateTime, fund.refund_time as refundTime,fund.refund_num as refundNum,fund.reason as reason, fund.status as refundStatus from inno72_order o left join inno72_order_refund fund on o.id = fund.order_id left join inno72_order_goods og on o.id = og.order_id where o.pay_status=1 and o.user_id =#{gameUserId} order by o.order_time
